info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cabarrus and east central Mecklenburg Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 745 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Downtown Concord, or over Charlotte Motor Speedway, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Downtown Concord, Northeast Charlotte, East Charlotte, West Concord, Mint Hill, Harrisburg, University City, Reedy Creek Park, Charlotte Motor Speedway and Hidden Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
